name: dffrege69

body: |- wb(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))), whe(c1, c0))

comment: If from the proposition that ` x ` has property ` A ` it can be inferred generally, whatever ` x ` may be, that every result of an application of the procedure ` R ` to ` x ` has property ` A ` , then we say " Property ` A ` is hereditary in the ` R ` -sequence. Definition 69 of [Frege1879] p. 55. (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.)
